author: A_Brickset_user
title: Yes, many yellow bricks
review: This set has many yellow bricks and I have 4 of them. TO FJOLNIR (and others who don't know to use the dogs head), I have put 2 of them upside at corners of a house as a sort of stone decoration, just like the lionheads in Knights Kingdom 1 and Harry Potter. I have made from the yellow bricks my first MOC a simple yellow house with balcony on front.
